text: == Events == * January 11 – Pope Miltiades ends his reign as the Catholic Pope. * August 30 – Council of Arles, which confirmed the pronouncement of Donatism as a schism, and passed other canons. * Synod of Ancyra: consulting a magician is declared a sin earning five years of penance. * Pope Silvester I succeeds Pope Miltiades. * Alexander becomes Bishop of Byzantium.
